      • updateDishInBasket

        void updateDishInBasket​(comp1206.sushi.common.User user,
                        comp1206.sushi.common.Dish dish,
                        java.lang.Number quantity)
        Update a dish in the basket with a new quantity. If the quantity is 0, the item should be removed.
        Parameters:
        user - user of basket
        dish - dish to change
        quantity - quantity to set. 0 should remove.

      • addUpdateListener

        void addUpdateListener​(comp1206.sushi.common.UpdateListener listener)
        Add a new update listener to the client. This should be notified when any model changes occur that require the UI to update.
        Parameters:
        listener - An update listener to be informed of all model changes.

      • notifyUpdate

        void notifyUpdate()
        Notify all listeners of a model update. This is primarily used to update the UI after changes have been made.
